description:
Nonograms Prophecy is a logical game designed for a single player challenge.
Your goal is to solve tricky puzzles in order to reveal a secret picture.
Game offers an interactive tutorial to introduce rules and hints for beginners.
Experienced players will enjoy huge and challenging puzzles in various sizes (from 5x5 to 20x20).
You can play color puzzles to reveal more sophisticated pictures.
Improve your skills by setting new personal records.

FEATURES:
▪ Over 380 puzzles to solve!
▪ Unique, Ancient Greece design!
▪ 3 game modes: Classic, Color, Big Picture!
▪ Interactive tutorial to help beginners!
▪ Advanced puzzles for experts!
▪ All the puzzles approved by Zeus!

Nonograms Prophecy is available in all 3 following languages:
1) English
2) Russian
3) Polish

The game has been tested on Gods and Goddes.
name: Nonograms Prophecy
